testCases.title: Verify user can navigate to Billing
testCases.expectedResult: Billing page should be displayed with header and action buttons

testCases.title: Verify clear/cross button functionality
testCases.expectedResult: User should be navigated back to Dashboard

testCases.title: Verify Daily Billing button navigation
steps: Verify navigation to Daily Billing view
testCases.expectedResult: User should be navigated to Daily Billing view/page

testCases.title: Verify clinic dropdown is visible and accessible
testCases.expectedResult: Clinic dropdown should be visible and accessible on the daily billing page

testCases.title: Verify switching clinic updates billing records
steps: Select a different clinic from dropdown
Refresh page to load new records
Verify billing records are updated for selected clinic
testCases.expectedResult: After selecting clinic and refreshing page, billing grid should display selected clinic's records

testCases.title: Verify selected clinic remains active after page refresh
steps: Verify previously selected clinic remains selected
testCases.expectedResult: Previously selected clinic should remain selected after page refresh

testCases.title: Verify system does not display previous clinic data after switching
steps: Note billing records for Clinic A
Refresh page to load Clinic A data
Switch to Clinic B from dropdown
Refresh page to load Clinic B data
Verify no data from Clinic A is visible in billing grid
testCases.expectedResult: No data from Clinic A should be visible after switching to Clinic B

testCases.title: Verify selected clinic is visually indicated
steps: Verify selected clinic is displayed in dropdown field
testCases.expectedResult: Selected clinic should be clearly highlighted in the dropdown and visible in the dropdown field

testCases.title: Verify DOS panel is displayed on Daily Billing - Injury page
steps: Verify DOS panel is visible on the left side
Verify DOS panel contains list of dates
testCases.expectedResult: DOS panel should be visible on the left side with list of dates

testCases.title: Verify selecting a DOS loads corresponding billing records
steps: Click on a DOS date from the panel
Verify billing records displayed are for selected DOS
testCases.expectedResult: Billing grid should refresh and display records for selected DOS

testCases.title: Verify user can filter billing records using valid From and To dates
steps: Verify billing records within the selected date range are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Billing records within the selected date range should be displayed correctly

testCases.title: Verify calendar icon opens date picker for From and To fields and can select dates from that
steps: Click calendar icon for From date
Navigate to December 2025 in date picker
Select day 15 from the date picker
Verify selected date (12/15/2025) is displayed in From field
Click calendar icon for To date
Navigate to January 2026 in date picker
Select day 5 from the date picker
Verify selected date (01/05/2026) is displayed in To field
Click Search button to apply filters
Verify billing records are filtered based on selected date range (12/15/2025 to 01/05/2026)
testCases.expectedResult: Date picker should open for both From and To fields, dates can be selected correctly from the picker (From: 12/15/2025, To: 01/05/2026), and billing records should be filtered based on the selected date range

testCases.title: Verify system behavior when To date is earlier than From date
steps: Set To date to 12/15/2025 (earlier than From date)
Verify system behavior - check for error messages or validation
Verify system does not crash and remains responsive
testCases.expectedResult: System should handle invalid date range gracefully - either display validation error or return empty result set without crashing
